decks.notes: This deck focuses on assembling a powerful combo using Gyruda, Doom of Depths and Keruga, the Macrosage as companions. The key strategy involves using Leyline Binding to control the board while setting up for the combo. Spinewoods Armadillo and Trumpeting Carnosaur provide additional value and control, while Spark Double and Release to the Wind offer flexibility and recursion. The mana base is focused on consistency and versatility, with various triomes and land cards to support the deck's goals. Overall, the deck aims to discover synergies and create explosive plays to secure victory.

The main focus of this deck is to control and manipulate the game through counterspells, removal, and card advantage. By utilizing powerful control spells like Fatal Push, Thoughtseize, and Narset, Parter of Veils, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan and gain incremental advantages. The addition of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion allows for extra card advantage and flexibility in gameplay. The deck also includes powerful finishers like The Meathook Massacre and Stormchaser's Talent to close out the game once control has been established.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creature plays, utilizing cards like Tyvar, Jubilant Brawler and Rubblebelt Maverick to quickly overwhelm opponents. It also includes disruptive elements like Fatal Push and Priest of Forgotten Gods to control the board. The deck includes a mix of graveyard interaction with cards like Stitcher's Supplier and Deathrite Shaman, as well as ramp options with Agatha's Soul Cauldron and Cult Conscript. The mana base is carefully crafted to ensure consistent access to both colors and enable powerful plays early in the game.
